snippet: A bride-to-be travels to New Delhi to search for a dress and finds herself a new suitor in “Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania.”
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews film Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania, written and directed by Shashank Khaitan and starring Alia Bhatt.
lead_paragraph: A bride-to-be travels to New Delhi to search for a dress and finds herself a new suitor in “Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania.”

headline.seo: ‘Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania,’ a Bollywood Romantic Comedy
headline.main: A Bride Finds Her Gown, and a Groom
headline.print_headline: A Bride Finds Her Gown, and a Groom
